channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC NET CP 343-1 Advanced (incl. SIPLUS variants)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC NET CP 343-1 Advanced (incl. SIPLUS variants)

item.title: CVE-2020-25242|2024-08-04T15:33:05.559Z -- siemens -- simatic%20net%20cp%20343-1%20advanced%20%28incl.%20siplus%20variants%29
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC NET CP 343-1 Advanced (incl. SIPLUS variants) (All versions), SIMATIC NET CP 343-1 Lean (incl. SIPLUS variants) (All versions), SIMATIC NET CP 343-1 Standard (incl. SIPLUS variants) (All versions). Specially crafted packets sent to TCP port 102 could cause a Denial-of-Service condition on the affected devices. A cold restart might be necessary in order to recover.
